Class.name: csp.GlobalBinary
Class.Description: Хранение больших файлов ресурсов (js,png,css) > 32kb в глобале и выгрузка их через csp страницу

Parameter.name: CONTENTTYPE
Parameter.Description: Specifies the default content type for the page. This can be overriden using the <CSP:CONTENT TYPE=> tag, or by setting the %response.ContentType property in the OnPreHTTP method. The default value if this parameter is not set is text/html. text/javascript text/css

Method.name: Export
Import
Method.Implementation: s major=$system.Version.GetMajor() s class="^"_%class, class=$na(@class@(1)) $$$GENERATE(" k "_class_" ") $$$GENERATE(" s file=##class(%File).%New(file) ") $$$GENERATE(" d file.Open(""RU:/TRANSLATE=0"") ") if major < 2008 { $$$GENERATE(" s s=##class(%GlobalBinaryStream).%New("""_class_""") ") } else { $$$GENERATE(" s s=##class(%Stream.GlobalBinary).%New("""_class_""") ") } $$$GENERATE(" d s.CopyFromAndSave(file) ") $$$GENERATE(" d file.Close() k file,s ") $$$GENERATE(" Q $$$OK ") Q $$$OK
